answers.answer: I had it with my first and my ob told me there is a high chance of getting it again and they will  monitor me more closely throughout the pregnancy.
I have it,i'm being induced Wednesday at 37 1/2 Weeks
It can happen again and you will be closely monitored.  Goodluck!

question: Hi Ladies,Have any of you had preeclampsia or severe preeclampsia during a 2nd pregnancy? I am currently pregnant with #3 and delivered my son at 31 weeks due to severe preeclampsia.
title: Preeclampsia in a 2nd pregnancy?
